resources.string: We invite you on a special journey through a seemingly ordinary village. Our guide will be Mr. Andrzej Legrand, a resident of Kalinowice and a lover of local history. Thanks to him, we will learn about the biggest local secrets and discover priceless treasures of knowledge.
The exact route depends on your choices, but you can expect it to be about 13 km long. Consider breaking the journey into a few days or using a bike.
